mapper.update:
update sys_role
name=#{name},
description=#{description},
sort=#{sort},
updateTime=#{updateTime},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select sr.* from sys_role sr ,proj_role_relation prr where 1=1 and sr.id=prr.role_id and prr.proj_id=#{projId} order by sr.sort

select c.role_id as "roleId" ,c.role_name as "roleName" ,GROUP_CONCAT(c.user_id_name SEPARATOR ',') as "userList" from ( select r.id as role_id ,r.name as role_name ,concat_ws('_',u.id,u.nickname) as user_id_name from sys_project p ,proj_role_relation pr ,sys_role r ,sys_role_user ru ,sys_user u where p.id=pr.proj_id and pr.role_id=r.id and r.id=ru.roleId and u.id=ru.userId and p.id=#{projId} ) c
group by c.role_id,c.role_name
mapper.delete: delete from sys_role where id=#{id} and id not in (1,20)
mapper.select: select sr.id,sr.name,sr.description ,sr.createTime,sr.updateTime ,sr.sort ,sp.id as projId from sys_role sr ,proj_role_relation prr ,sys_project sp where 1=1 and sr.id=prr.role_id and prr.proj_id=sp.id and sr.id=#{id} order by sr.sort
select count(1) from sys_role sr ,proj_role_relation prr ,sys_project sp where 1=1 and sr.id=prr.role_id and prr.proj_id=sp.id and sr.name=#{name} and sp.id=#{projId}
select sp.id from sys_role sr ,sys_role_permission srp ,sys_permission sp where 1=1 and sr.id=srp.roleId and srp.permissionId=sp.id and sr.id=#{roleId}
